name: Ruthenium tetroxide
desc: Ruthenium tetroxide (Ruthenium(VIII) oxide) is the inorganic compound with the formula RuO4. It is a colourless, diamagnetic liquid, but samples are typically black due to impurities. It is volatile. The analogous OsO4 is more widely used and better known. One of the few solvents in which it forms stable solutions is CCl4.
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
